status.title: Current Status
status.noProfileDescription: Let's set up your profile to track your immigration journey.
status.f1Description: You are currently on F-1 student visa status. Focus on maintaining your studies and prepare for your next steps.
status.optPendingDescription: Your OPT application is being processed. You can start working once you receive your EAD card.
status.optApprovedDescription: Your OPT is approved! You can work for up to 12 months (or 36 months with STEM extension).

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.noTimelineDescription: Set up your profile to see your immigration timeline.
timeline.noEvents: No events found for the selected filter.

todo.title: To Do
todo.noProfileDescription: Set up your profile to get a personalized to-do list.
todo.currentFocusDescription: Actions you need to take now
todo.getReadyForDescription: Upcoming actions in the next 30-90 days
todo.allCaughtUpDescription: You have no pending action items. Check back later or update your profile if your status changes.
todo.workOnActions: Work on the actions below to prepare for your transition.

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearAllDataDescription: Delete all your profile and timeline data
settings.clearAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.
settings.profileCreated: Profile created! Check your Status tab.
settings.failedToSave: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

profile.hasStemDegree: Do you have a STEM degree?
profile.hasJobOffer: Do you have a job offer?

formFields.f1StudentHelp: We'll calculate when you can apply for OPT (90 days before graduation)

formFields.optApprovedHelp: Track your OPT expiration and prepare for next steps

formFields.stemOptApprovedHelp: Track I-983 reporting deadlines and STEM OPT expiration

formFields.h1bRegisteredHelp: Monitor H-1B lottery results and prepare for next steps

formFields.h1bPetitionFiledHelp: Track your H-1B processing and prepare for status change
formFields.h1bApprovedHelp: Prepare for H-1B status activation on October 1st
